name: Squat Your Dog!
description:
Not everyone has what it takes to become a dog-squat master, but you never know until you try.

Swipe to squat as many times as you can, and also test your skills with a 10 second dog-squat challenge. You may think it looks easy, but this grueling workout is enough to bring even the most experienced dog-squatters to their knees.

Even I thought the game would get old, but here I am 10,000 dog squats later, and my calfs feel better than ever. Think what this game could do for you!

Get ready to #SquatYourDog!
